verses.verse: Then <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H5011>Nob<s%> to <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> the <S%H3548>priest.<s%> <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> came to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H2729>trembling,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H376>him,<s%> "Why are you alone, and no man with you?"

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> "The <S%H4428>king<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me a <S%H1697>business,<s%> and has <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H376>me,<s%> 'Let no man <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3972>anything<s%> of the <S%H1697>business<s%> about which I <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H6680>you,<s%> and what I have commanded <S%H6680>you;<s%> and I have appointed the young <S%H5288>men<s%> to <S%H6423>such<s%> and <S%H492>such<s%> a <S%H4725>place.<s%>'

Now therefore what <S%H3426>is<s%> under your <S%H3027>hand?<s%> <S%H5414>Give<s%> me <S%H2568>five<s%> loaves of <S%H3899>bread<s%> in my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> or whatever there is <S%H4672>present.<s%>"

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H6030>said,<s%> "There is no <S%H2455>common<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> under my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> but there <S%H3426>is<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3899>bread;<s%> if only the young <S%H5288>men<s%> have <S%H8104>kept<s%> themselves <S%H389>from<s%> <S%H802>women.<s%>"

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H6030>said<s%> to <S%H518>him,<s%> "Truly, <S%H802>women<s%> have been <S%H6113>kept<s%> from us about these <S%H8032>three<s%> <S%H8543>days.<s%> When I came <S%H3318>out,<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the young <S%H5288>men<s%> were <S%H6944>holy,<s%> though it was but a <S%H2455>common<s%> <S%H1870>journey.<s%> How much more then <S%H3117>today<s%> shall their <S%H3627>vessels<s%> be <S%H6942>holy?<s%>"

So the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3899>bread;<s%> for there was no bread there but the show <S%H3899>bread,<s%> that was <S%H5493>taken<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H2527>hot<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when it was taken <S%H3947>away.<s%>

Now a certain <S%H376>man<s%> of the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was there that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H6113>detained<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and his <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H1673>Doeg<s%> the <S%H130>Edomite,<s%> the <S%H47>best<s%> of the <S%H7462>herdsmen<s%> who belonged to <S%H7586>Saul.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H288>Ahimelech,<s%> <S%H371>"Isn't<s%> <S%H3426>there<s%> here under your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H2595>spear<s%> or <S%H2719>sword?<s%> For I have neither <S%H3947>brought<s%> my <S%H2719>sword<s%> nor my <S%H3627>weapons<s%> with <S%H3027>me,<s%> because the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1697>business<s%> <S%H1961>required<s%> <S%H5169>haste.<s%>"

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H2719>sword<s%> of <S%H1555>Goliath<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistine,<s%> whom you <S%H5221>killed<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H425>Elah,<s%> <S%H3874>behold,<s%> it is here wrapped in a <S%H8071>cloth<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> the <S%H646>ephod.<s%> If you will <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H3947>that,<s%> take <S%H312>it;<s%> for there is no other <S%H2108>except<s%> that <S%H2088>here.<s%>" <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "There is none like <S%H5414>that.<s%> Give it to me."

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H1272>fled<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> for <S%H6440>fear<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and <S%H935>went<s%> to <S%H397>Achish<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1661>Gath.<s%>

The <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>him,<s%> "Isn't this David the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H776>land?<s%> <S%H6030>Didn't<s%> they sing one to another about <S%H2088>him<s%> in <S%H4246>dances,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7586><s%> 'Saul has <S%H5221>slain<s%> his <S%H505>thousands,<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> his ten <S%H505>thousands?<s%>'"

<S%H1732>David<s%> laid <S%H7760>up<s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%> in his <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3372>afraid<s%> <S%H6440>of<s%> <S%H397>Achish<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1661>Gath.<s%>

He <S%H8138>changed<s%> his <S%H2940>behavior<s%> <S%H5869>before<s%> <S%H1984>them,<s%> and pretended to be mad in their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and <S%H8427>scrabbled<s%> on the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and let his <S%H7388>spittle<s%> fall <S%H3381>down<s%> on his <S%H2206>beard.<s%>
Then <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H7200>"Look,<s%> you see the <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H7696>mad.<s%> Why then have you brought him to <S%H935>me?<s%>

Do I <S%H2638>lack<s%> <S%H7696>madmen,<s%> that you have <S%H935>brought<s%> this fellow to play the <S%H7696>madman<s%> in my <S%H935>presence?<s%> Shall this fellow come into my <S%H1004>house?<s%>"
